column5: Designed to develop professionals who can lead in a cyber environment, to effectively exploit the threats and opportunities of cyberspace at the organisational level. The course focuses on understanding and articulating the executive-level responses to serious present and emerging threats in the information domain.Who is it for?Students will be government, corporate and critical information infrastructure staff who are one or more of the following:
column7: MSc Full-time £19,500MSc Part-time £19,500PgDip Full-time £15,700PgDip Part-time £15,700PgCert Full-time £7,850PgCert Part-time £7,850
column9: MSc: up to five years part-time. PgDip : up to four years part-time. PgCert: up to 3 years part-time
